summary: Adds a powerful one-handed daedric chakram to the game which can be crafted at any forge.
descriptionHtml:
[font=century gothic][size=5]BASIC INFO[/size]
Adds a powerful one-handed daedric chakram to the game which
can be crafted at any forge. It uses the one-handed sword animations.

[right][size=5]REQUIREMENTS[/size]
Skyrim version 1.9.32[/right]

[size=5]CRAFTING & TEMPERING[/size]
A powerful weapon requires rare materials to make and upgrade

Recipe for Crafting:
- 4 Daedra Heart
- 6 Ebony Ingot
- 15 leather Strips

Recipe for Upgrading/Tempering:
- 2 Daedra Heart
- 6 Ebony Ingot

[right][size=5]RECOMMENDATIONS[/size]
Texture Replacer: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3104]Daedric Armor and Weapon Improvement[/url]
Weapon Mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27614/]Reaper of Souls Scythe[/url][/right]

[size=5]INSTALLATION[/size]
NMM or MO:
- download the file
- simply install

MANUAL:
- download main file
- extract files with winRAR
- copy all the files you extracted then paste it in your data folder
- open your SkyrimLauncher and activate the mod
- start Skyrim and have fun

[center][size=5]VIDEO PREVIEW[/size]
[youtube]1SXCbu4G-d4[/youtube][/center]
[line][/font][font=century gothic]
[/font][center][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/60224-1-1416820902.png[/img][/center]
author: Loshirai14

files.name: Daedric Chakram
files.changelogHtml: Removed some parts to reduce clipping.
